resources.string: We use this info to tailor categorization and suggest \nsmart rules based on your work.
What are you hoping to achieve?
Who are you, how do you work?
What sector do you primarily operate in?
Connect to your email to unlock automatic receipt and invoice detection. No more forwarding or manual uploads.
We\'ll only scan for receipts-not your personal emails. \nYour credentials are never shared with us.
Enable access to automate receipt capture and \nmileage tracking. No manual uploads.
To instantly scan paper receipts \nwithout manual uploads
You\'ll now see system permission popups. Please allow access to keep things automatic and organized from day one.
To detect and organize receipts \nalready saved in your phone\'s \ngallery
To auto-detect receipts and \nconfirmations sent via text-no \nsearching required
To log where transactions happen \nand auto-tag trips or visits
%1$s permission is needed for this app to function properly. Would you like to grant it?
To disable this permission, you need to go to App Settings. Would you like to open settings now?
